title: Duo Troll needs ban
body:
As if it isn't hard enough to claw your way out of the bronze elo as it is, but currently there is a duo, one of rank Bronze 5 with 0LP, the other in Silver 3. They get matched with high bronze players, I assume because the matchmaking just splits the difference, but they queue as "fill" and no matter which role they get, they will both go toplane leaving at least 1 lane or jungle unattended. I have had them 2 games in a row (reported by the entire team both times) and just had to dodge to get out of being locked in with them for a third. I want to know, why there is no action being taken on players such as this, and why, if i report someone who is obviously not playing the game correctly, I am getting matched with them game after game? If this continually happens to me and the culprits have no punishment, why shouldn't I do it? Looks fun enough, enraging the whole team, to the amusement of yourself and not being reprimanded at all. It's no wonder this server, and bronze elo in particular is so bitter and toxic. For those who read this before the moderators sensor the names:
Bronze 5 - SkyCladNatsu
Silver 3 - Serah Farron
Stay safe friends.
